title: Death Toll Rises to 9 As Assam Floods Claim Another Life; Army, NDRF, Assam Rifles Mobilised To Provide Aid | The Weather Channel - Articles from The Weather Channel | weather.com - The Weather Channel
content:

description: At least 6,62,385 people, including 1,25,491 children and 2,44,216 women, have been affected and nearly 8,260 houses have been either partially or completely damaged in 1,414 villages across 27 districts. - Articles from The Weather Channel | weather.com
